meanings.definition: Not involving the practice of eating human flesh.
meanings.sent1: The peaceful tribe had a noncannibalistic culture.
meanings.sent2: The noncannibalistic diet of the herbivores kept them healthy.
meanings.sent3: The noncannibalistic picnic featured only plant-based dishes.
meanings.sent4: In the noncannibalistic world of animals, predators hunt for survival.
meanings.sent5: The noncannibalistic rule of the community ensured harmony among its members.

meanings.definition: Not exhibiting behavior characteristic of cannibals.
meanings.sent1: The noncannibalistic behavior of the group promoted unity.
meanings.sent2: The noncannibalistic nature of the species surprised researchers.
meanings.sent3: The noncannibalistic party was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: In the noncannibalistic society, sharing is a common practice.
meanings.sent5: The noncannibalistic attitude of the team led to success in their mission.
